Html: How do you install and use this great tool?Â  I have been looking all over for the instructions....I tried installing it in the game as a mod, but that didnt work and I tried just starting the exe file, but that also failed....

This isn't an ingame mod/addon.

You need to download and then run the exe file. If you get an error on startup, it might be due to .net not being available on your computer.

Check the readme file for more details on handling the.net issue and using the program. (It might seem that it only lists features and versions, but inbetween there is some useful info).

(BTW: I think we need to reorder the readme file, since in its current format it, can be confusing and end up hiding the info new guys need to get going).
Or, there's the ever-popular "You forgot to unzip it" problem.
